mapper.insert: insert into savingBase (savingID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, joinWay, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember, etcNote, dclsStart) values (#{savingID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{joinWay}, #{interest}, #{spclCnd}, #{maxLimit}, #{joinMember}, #{etcNote}, #{dclsStart})

insert into savingOption (savingID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, intrRate, intrRate2, saveTrm, rsrvTypeName, intrRateTypeName) values (#{savingID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{intrRate}, #{intrRate2}, #{saveTrm}, #{rsrvTypeName}, #{intrRateTypeName})
mapper.select: SELECT sb.savingID, comName, prdName, joinWay, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember, etcNote, intrRate, intrRate,MAX(intrRate2) as intrRate2, MAX(saveTrm) as saveTrm,rsrvTypeName, intrRateTypeName FROM savingBase as sb inner join savingOption as so on sb.savingID = so.savingID group by prdName
